plot: Captain Daphne Ballantine, an intrepid adventurer, is in a race with the nefarious Mr. Darrow to find the lost treasure of The Painted Lady.
title: Captain Ballantine and the Painted Lady
plot_es: Captain Daphne Ballantine, an intrepid adventurer, is in a race with the nefarious Mr. Darrow to find the lost treasure of The Painted Lady.
original_name: Captain Ballantine and the Painted Lady
plot_en: Captain Daphne Ballantine, an intrepid adventurer, is in a race with the nefarious Mr. Darrow to find the lost treasure of The Painted Lady.
